Education level of blacks by gender

Data for Exercise 8.55

Blackedu

Format

A data frame with 3800 observations on two variables.

gender
a factor with levels Female and Male
education
a factor with levels High school dropout, High school graudate, Some college, Bachelor's degree, and Graduate degree

References

Kitchens, L. J. (2003) Basic Statistics and Data Analysis. Duxbury

Examples


T1 <- xtabs(~gender + education, data = Blackedu)
T1
#>         education
#> gender   High school dropout High school graduate Some college
#>   Female                 486                  659          691
#>   Male                   496                  530          435
#>         education
#> gender   Bachelor's degree Graduate degree
#>   Female               208              96
#>   Male                 134              65
#> 
chisq.test(T1)
#> 
#> 	Pearson's Chi-squared test
#> 
#> data:  T1
#> X-squared = 34.195, df = 4, p-value = 6.797e-07
#> 
#>
